summary: Air Canada Virtual airline simulation web app with glassmorphism design, featuring flight departures/booking with saved reservation data (Discord and Roblox usernames), careers page with external Google Form integration for Flight Deck applications, extended career application forms, and password-protected admin dashboard for flight management
architectural_notes: Glassmorphism design with dark headers and white/light-blue content areas
Red Air Canada rondelle as primary accent color
Admin panel reveals flight management form upon successful authentication
JavaScript-based password verification with red error messages
Hidden admin route accessible via footer button or /admin-ops
Roblox-style imagery integration for virtual airline community feel
Flight reservations persist Discord and Roblox usernames to localStorage/backend
Flight Deck career applications redirect to external Google Form instead of internal form
Staff applications (Cabin Crew, ATC) save data locally or to backend storage

existing_features.title: Implement glassmorphism design system with dark themed headers, white/light-blue content areas, and red Air Canada rondelle as primary accent color throughout the application

Create Departures page with dynamic flight list displaying Flight Number (e.g., AC851), Origin, Destination, Aircraft Type (e.g., Boeing 787-8), Departure Time, Arrival Time, and a Book button for each flight

Implement booking modal that appears when Book button is clicked, displaying a digital boarding pass with the selected flight's details (Flight Number, Origin, Destination, Aircraft Type, Departure/Arrival times)
Create Careers page with grid-style layout displaying roles for Flight Deck, Cabin Crew, and ATC, each with buttons linking to a simulated application form

Create hidden admin route at /admin-ops with password-protected access using hardcoded password 'Flighttime415!!' (case-sensitive), displaying 'Invalid Credentials. Security notified.' error message in red when wrong password is entered

Implement Flight Management Dashboard in admin area with input fields for Origin City, Destination City, Departure Time, Arrival Time, Aircraft Model, and a Publish Flight button that adds the new flight to the live Departures list
Add Live Flight Status ticker component using aviation terminology including Gate Assignment, Pushback Time, and Load Factor
Add hidden Staff Login button in the footer that navigates to /admin-ops route
Replace the Air Canada rondelle logo with the red maple leaf logo from the uploaded image (download.png) throughout the application
Add Discord username and Roblox username fields to the flight reservation form in the booking modal
Persist flight reservation data including passenger name, Discord username, Roblox username, and flight details to the backend when a booking is completed

Redirect Flight Deck applications to the external Google Form at https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdHbu3uQxKbs4du8DKS17rvnxW_GS7byy3deho6Nr_XgMPMiw/viewform instead of showing the internal application form
Expand the career application form for Cabin Crew and ATC roles with additional detailed questions beyond name, email, experience, and motivation
Persist staff application data for Cabin Crew and ATC roles to the backend when an application is submitted
Add the uploaded aircraft/airport scene image (image.png) as a visual asset in the application
Redesign the main page hero section to match the uploaded reference images (image-1.png, image-2.png) with a prominent 'Where can we take you?' headline centered over the background image
Add a flight status indicator to the main page that displays the current operational status (e.g., 'On Time', 'Delayed', 'Cancelled') prominently in the hero or header area
Add flight status editing controls to the admin dashboard at /admin-ops allowing staff to select and update the operational status (On Time, Delayed, Cancelled, etc.)
Connect the main page flight status indicator to the backend getFlightStatus query and refresh status automatically using React Query

new_feature_requests.summary: Departures page with dynamic flight list showing flight details and booking capability
Booking modal with digital boarding pass display
Careers page with grid layout for Flight Deck, Cabin Crew, and ATC roles
Password-protected admin dashboard at /admin-ops with flight management
Live flight status ticker with aviation terminology
Save flight reservation data including Discord username and Roblox username
Redirect Flight Deck applications to external Google Form (https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdHbu3uQxKbs4du8DKS17rvnxW_GS7byy3deho6Nr_XgMPMiw/viewform)
Save staff application data for Cabin Crew and ATC roles
Extend career application forms with more detailed questions
Add Discord username and Roblox username fields to flight reservation form
Display flight status (on time/delayed) on main page with admin edit capability
Add a FlightStatus type to the backend with fields for status text and timestamp, and implement functions to set and retrieve the current flight status
